channel.title: I cant get people to connect to my server? URGENT!
channel.description:
i portforwarded and they cant connect to my server but every other source i downloaded and tried they can connect to it and play. What could be the problem?
any idea how to fix it thanks?

item.title: I cant get people to connect to my server? URGENT!
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

It varies by router as well, My router (linksys) requires you to uncheck “block anonymous internet requests” as well.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant get people to connect to my server? URGENT!

item.title: I cant get people to connect to my server? URGENT!
item.dc:creator: @bluecheesepiff bluecheesepiff
item.description:
@bluecheesepiff wrote:

Did you port foward correctly and have you got a no-ip, go youtube for step by step instructions and make sure you follow them.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant get people to connect to my server? URGENT!

item.title: I cant get people to connect to my server? URGENT!
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Make sure that the client they are using is set to connect to your IP and not set to their local address.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant get people to connect to my server? URGENT!

item.title: I cant get people to connect to my server? URGENT!
item.dc:creator: @ladaswa ladaswa
item.description:
@ladaswa wrote:

maybe your previous ones were on port 43594 while this one listens in on 5555? and you’ll have to reportforward THAT port?

Read full topic
